name: Snowball Catcher
description:
Snowball CatcherThis is a catch game, where you collect snowballs over and over again, creating a loop cycle.
----------------------------------------------
How 2 PlayCatch snowballs with your bowl/catcher to score points, however, there are fake snowballs that if once caught, takes out a total of 5 points from your total previous points.
Normal Mode:Try to catch the most snowballs and get the highest score in 2 minutes!
Endless Mode:Catch as many snowballs as you like, no end game screen!
----------------------------------------------
Game Controls:LEFT or A: Move left.
RIGHT or D: Move right.
ESCAPE or BACKSPACE: Back out.
----------------------------------------------
Menu Controls:UP or W: Cycle up.
DOWN or S: Cycle down.
ENTER or SPACE: Accept selection.
----------------------------------------------
InfoDeveloper/Author: Blue2359 AKA me :p,
This is a game made for the HaxeJam 2023, (Winter Jam: Again & Again).
https://itch.io/jam/haxejam-2023-winter-jam
The Haxe Jam logo was created by Renchu in Clip Studio Paint,
Haxe Jam logo source: https://github.com/haxejam/assets
Game Source Code: https://github.com/Blue2359/Snowball-Catcher
